div.h1:
Thayer R-II School
Together We Provide The Foundation For Lifelong Learning

Notice of Rights of Elementary and Secondary Schools

p.span: Thayer RII School would like to welcome you to our website! If there is any information you cannot find, please CLICK HERE to email for website assistance. Please be sure to subscribe to our Facebook and Twitter accounts to receive updates on school and district information!

span.strong: Distance Learning website is now online and can be viewed by CLICKING HERE

img.alt: This is the image for the news article titled Continued Learning Information

div.div: We have decided to have teachers work from home to develop learning activities for students at their grade level or in a specific content area. These are sent to our technology director who is then uploading them to our website by grade level and by content area.
div.a: Read More about Continued Learning Information

img.alt: This is the image for the news article titled Update to Meal Distribution and School Work

a.title: Update to Meal Distribution and School Work

div.a: Update to Meal Distribution and School Work
div.div: UPDATE to Meal Distribution for Thayer Students for the Week of March 23rd: Please click on "Read More" to see full update.
div.a: Read More about Update to Meal Distribution and School Work

img.alt: This is the image for the news article titled Thayer R-II District Plan Update for COVID-19

a.title: Thayer R-II District Plan Update for COVID-19

div.a: Thayer R-II District Plan Update for COVID-19
div.div: The Thayer R-II School District would like to update you on the plan the district is working on in respect to the Coronavirus/COVID-19 pandemic. We are in close communication with our local health department, and we continue to monitor websites of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), the World Health Organization (WHO) and Missouri Department of Health and Senior Services (MODHSS) in order to keep current on this evolving situation.
div.a: Read More about Thayer R-II District Plan Update for COVID-19

img.alt: This is the image for the news article titled District Report Card

div.div: To view all state mandated statistical data about the Thayer School District, please visit the Missouri Department of Elementary and Secondary Education School Profile page at this link: Click HERE .
div.a: Read More about District Report Card

blockquote.style: color: rgb(80, 0, 80); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;

div.span:
The Department of Elementary and Secondary Education school counseling staff has compiled and placed information related to labor shortages and job attainment on their website. This information will update regularly.
Follow the link below: https://dese.mo.gov/college-career-readiness/school-counseling ​

div.div: 401 East Walnut Street, Thayer, MO 65791 | Phone 4172644600 | Fax 4172644608
